titles.title: I Will Offer Up My Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will offer up my life In spirit and truth Pouring out the oil of love As my worship to You In surrender I must give my every part Lord, receive this sacrifice of a broken heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, what can I give, what can I bring To so faithful a Friend, to so loving a King? Savior, what can be said, what can be sung As a praise of Your name, for the things You have done? Oh, my words could not tell, not even in part Of the debt of love that is owed by this thankful heart{/lang-eng}
